limit.title: Project limit reached
limit.description: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited projects

empty.title: Add your first project
empty.description:
Connect via MCP from Claude Code, Cursor, etc.
or upload your project directly

analysis.title: Tech Stack Analysis
analysis.description: AI analyzes project files to automatically detect your tech stack
analysis.noFilesDescription:
Upload files first to start analysis.
You can send project files via MCP or API.
analysis.readyDescription: Analyzing tech stack based on {count} uploaded files
analysis.analyzingDescription: AI is analyzing your project files. Please wait.
analysis.defaultError: Something went wrong during analysis. Please try again.
analysis.errorGuidanceLlm: Please check your LLM API key. Register or re-enter your key in settings.
analysis.errorGuidanceFile: Not enough files to analyze. Please upload more files to the project.
analysis.errorDefault: An error occurred during analysis. Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Project
delete.warning: All files, analysis results, and learning data will be permanently deleted.
delete.error: Failed to delete project. Please try again.
